name: Maria K.
comment: The best Greek coffee in town! Reminds me of my yiayia's coffee in Athens. The spanakopita is also delicious and authentic.

name: John D.
comment: Amazing breakfast options with a Greek twist. Love the yogurt bowls and the souvlaki platters for lunch are exceptional.

name: Sophie R.
comment: Great atmosphere and friendly staff. The moussaka is the closest thing I've had to the real deal since visiting Greece.

name: Alex T.
comment: A hidden gem! Perfect spot for both breakfast and lunch. Their freddo cappuccino is exactly like the ones in Greece.
